Na nkorɔfo dwendwen adze gyangyan ho yi: Na etumfo no bɔ mu tu egyina Tsia EWURADZE
"#Ndwu 4.25-26": na ne nyia ɔasera no no dɛ
column7: Na yɛntow hɔn nkyehoma mfi hɛnho ngu."

"Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na amanaman yɛ gyigyeegye: "Naaso nyia ɔtse sor no bɛserew: Nyew
"Na ɔbɛkasa akyerɛ hɔn wɔ n'ebufuw mu
Na nkorɔfo dwendwen adze gyangyan ho yi: Na oeyi hɔn hu wɔ n'ebufuhyew mu:"

"Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na amanaman yɛ gyigyeegye: "Na emi EWURADZE na mesi me hen Wɔ me bepɔw krɔnkrɔn Zion do."
"Mebɛka mbra no ho asɛm: EWURADZE see me dɛ
Na nkorɔfo dwendwen adze gyangyan ho yi: Ɔwo nye me ba; Emi na ndɛ da yi mawo wo."
na medze amanaman bɛma wo dɛ w'egyapadze
"#Ndwu 4.25-26": Na asaase ano noho dɛ w'enyadze."

"Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na amanaman yɛ gyigyeegye: "Edze dadzepoma bobubu hɔn; Ibobubu hɔn posoposo dɛ ɔwemfo awendze."

Na nkorɔfo dwendwen adze gyangyan ho yi: afei hom nhu nyansa: Asaase do atsɛmbuafo
Na hom mfa ahopopo ndzi ehurusi."

"Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na amanaman yɛ gyigyeegye: "Hom mfa enyidzi mapa mma no amma no bo eemmfuw
Na nkorɔfo dwendwen adze gyangyan ho yi: na hom aannhyew wɔ kwan no mu
"#Ndwu 4.25-26": Na aka ketseketse na n'ebufuw adzɛw. Esiarfo nye hɔn a wɔtwer no nyinara."
